effect.black-white: Inflicts regular damage. If the target takes damage this turn for any reason before this move is used, this move has double power.
effect.black-2-white-2: Inflicts regular damage. If the target takes damage this turn for any reason before this move is used, this move has double power.

short_effect.black-white: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: Power is doubled if the target has already received damage this turn.

flavor_text.black-white: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack’s power is doubled.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack’s power is doubled.
